title: Wutherinh Heights Book Cover
description: After finishing the classic Wuthering Heights, I developed a book cover design that combines analog and digital media, exploring the contrast between the contemporary and the timeless. The idea was to reinterpret the intensity and dark atmosphere of the novel through a modern visual lens, creating a dialogue between literary tradition and new aesthetic possibilities.
